rules_text: At the beginning of your upkeep, if a library has twenty or fewer cards left in it, return Returned Explorer from your graveyard to the battlefield tapped.
flavor_text:
[i]This is not a place of honor. You are not wanted here, dead or alive.
—Mephistan tomb inscription[/i]
notes:
Wanted Dead or Alive — Bon Jovi
